channel.title: Asset Catalog Tinkerer Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 2.7
item.description:
• New icon
  • Universal build for Apple Silicon and Intel
  • Adds the ability to copy multiple images to the clipboard at the same time
  • Dragging images out now uses the new drag and drop system on macOS, faster and compatible with a greater number of apps
  • Fixed a bug that prevented the QuickLook window from updating with the current selection when navigating with the arrow keys
  • Fixed a bug where the QuickLook window would stay visible after closing the current document

item.title: Version 2.5.1
item.description: • The app will now launch correctly on High Sierra

item.title: Version 2.5
item.description:
• Finally added an auto-update feature (thanks, Sparkle)
  • Improved handling of ProKit's theme stores
  • The app now comes with a QuickLook PlugIn so you can preview the contents of asset catalogs using QuickLook
